title: Gee Atherton’s Biggest Crash Yet — and His Road to Recovery
content:
“It was a heavy one — even by my standards.” – Gee Atherton, July 2021 On June 18, MTB legend Gee Atherton suffered the worst crash of his career. It occurred in the Welsh town of Dinas Mawddwy while filming the third installment to his The Ridge Line and The Slate Line series. On July […]

The post Gee Atherton’s Biggest Crash Yet — and His Road to Recovery appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
